powers:
Kaa transformed himself into a two-dimensional shadow, allowing him to camouflage himself in the shadows of others and attack unsuspecting victims. Kaa can become solid at will, but can also remain untouchable if he chooses, and Kaa possesses a certain amount of elasticity in his shadow form. 
As in the case of the Hulk, Kaa appeared to mimic the brute’s powers when psychically gaining control of his shadow. 

Despite his formidable powers, Kaa is still susceptible to the dangers that can overcome an actual shadow.
